title: Asset Factory Job Input Schema
description: Defines the structured input for a job submitted to the Asset Factory API.

prompt.description: The primary creative instruction for the asset generation.

output_format.description: The desired output format for the final asset.

mood.description: The desired mood or tone of the generated asset.

duration_in_seconds.description: The target duration for video or audio assets, in seconds.

platform_target.description: The social media platform the asset is being created for.

estimatedProcessingMs.description: An estimated processing time in milliseconds, used for the cost shield.
